thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: Jessica Reinicke
thread.title_full: Sammydress 的点评人 Jessica Reinicke

author: Jessica Reinicke
title: Jessica Reinicke
text: I never received the product. After 25 business days had passed, I started trying to contact them. Their website communication is convoluted and does not always load. They said I should have bought insurance on a $14 shirt, and since I didn't, they were willing to give me store credit for $4. DO NOT BE FOOLED.
